articles.content: Respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) is nothing new to the pediatric world. The illness, which causes symptoms such as runny nose and cough, typically spikes in the winter months. But in the aftermath o… [+4924 chars]

articles.title: Covid-19 vaccines do not contain DNA-altering robots - AFP Factcheck
articles.description: Social media posts claim that Covid-19 vaccines contain robotic "nanotechnology" that can change people's DNA. While they do include tiny fat bubbles to protect mRNA molecules -- an essential component of the shots -- they do not feature miniature robots, and…
